items.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
items.recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
 2. Cream together the butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
 3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined. Stir in the chocolate chips.
 4. Drop by rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets.
 5. Bake for 10-12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown. Let cool on baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

items.title: Spicy Arabiata Penne
items.recipe:
1. Cook the penne pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
 2. In a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and diced onion. Cook until the onion is translucent and the garlic is fragrant.
 3. Add the red pepper flakes and cook for another minute.
 4. Stir in the crushed tomatoes, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, and black pepper. Simmer for 10-15 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
 5. Add the cooked penne pasta to the pan and toss to coat it in the sauce.
 6. Serve the spicy Arabiata penne hot, garnished with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh basil leaves.

meals.title: Mac and Cheese
meals.recipe:
1. Cook the elbow macaroni according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
 2. In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Stir in the flour and cook for 1-2 minutes, until it turns golden brown.
 3. Gradually whisk in the milk, making sure there are no lumps. Cook until the mixture thickens and starts to bubble.
 4. Remove the saucepan from heat and stir in the shredded cheddar cheese and grated Parmesan cheese until melted and smooth.
 5. Stir in the cooked macaroni, salt, black pepper, and paprika until well coated.
 6. Serve the mac and cheese hot, garnished with additional shredded cheddar cheese if desired.

items.recipe: 1. Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). 2. Spread the pizza sauce over the crust. 3. Sprinkle with the mozzarella cheese and your favorite toppings. 4. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
